alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Halifax; Nash; Warren; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 5:25PM EDT until August 15 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Warren County in central North Carolina... Nash County in central North Carolina... Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Halifax County in central North Carolina... Northern Wilson County in central North Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 523 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Warrenton to 8 miles northeast of Dortches to Nashville to near Bailey, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Tarboro, Nashville, Halifax, Wilson, Scotland Neck, Elm City, Dortches, Bailey and Red Oak. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across the entire area. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
